statements: SELECT * FROM singing_performances ORDER BY performance_id DESC;
SELECT performer_name, song_title FROM singing_performances WHERE evaluation_score > 80;
SELECT performance_id, performer_name, performance_date FROM singing_performances WHERE performer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT song_title, performance_date FROM singing_performances ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM singing_performances WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT performer_name, song_title, performance_date FROM singing_performances WHERE evaluation_score > 90 ORDER BY performance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM singing_performances WHERE performer_name = 'John Doe' AND evaluation_score BETWEEN 80 AND 100 ORDER BY performance_date ASC
SELECT performer_name, performance_date FROM singing_performances WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY performer_name
SELECT song_title, evaluation_score FROM singing_performances WHERE performance_date > '2022-05-01' ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC
SELECT MAX(evaluation_score) AS max_score, MIN(evaluation_score) AS min_score FROM singing_performances WHERE performance_date < '2022-08-01'
SELECT * FROM singing_performances
SELECT performer_name, performance_rating FROM singing_performances WHERE performance_rating > 3
SELECT performer_name, performance_date FROM singing_performances WHERE performer_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM performance_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT performance_id, performer_name, performance_duration FROM singing_performances ORDER BY performance_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM performance_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT feedback_text, performance_rating FROM performance_feedback JOIN singing_performances ON performance_feedback.performance_id = singing_performances.performance_id WHERE performer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT performer_name, SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM performance_duration))/60 AS total_performance_minutes FROM singing_performances GROUP BY performer_name HAVING total_performance_minutes > 30;
SELECT performer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_performances FROM singing_performances GROUP BY performer_name ORDER BY total_performances DESC;
SELECT performer_name, AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM singing_performances GROUP BY performer_name HAVING average_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM performances;
SELECT singer_name, performance_date FROM performances ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT judge_name, specialization FROM judges WHERE specialization = 'Singing';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE judge_id = 1;
SELECT performance_id, singer_name, performance_rating FROM performances WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM performances ORDER BY performance_date DESC, performance_rating ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT singer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_performances FROM performances GROUP BY singer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT judge_name, specialization, COUNT(*) AS judegements FROM judges JOIN feedback ON judges.judge_id = feedback.judge_id GROUP BY judge_name, specialization;
SELECT singer_name, performance_date, performance_rating FROM performances WHERE performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Singers;
SELECT singer_name, performance_date FROM Singers;
SELECT song_title, genre FROM Songs ORDER BY genre DESC;
SELECT singer_name, performance_duration FROM Singers WHERE performer_id = 1;
SELECT performance_date, performance_rating FROM Performances WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT singer_name, performance_date FROM Singers;
SELECT song_title, genre, singer_id FROM Songs WHERE genre='Pop';
SELECT performance_date, performance_rating FROM Performances ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT singer_name AS Singer, COUNT(song_id) AS Total_Songs FROM Singers JOIN Songs ON Singers.singer_id = Songs.singer_id GROUP BY singer_name;

SELECT singer_name, performance_date, performance_duration FROM Singers JOIN Songs ON Singers.singer_id = Songs.singer_id JOIN Performances ON Songs.song_id = Performances.song_id WHERE singer_name='Adele';
SELECT * FROM Singers
SELECT singer_name, age, nationality FROM Singers
SELECT singer_id, singer_name, age FROM Singers WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM Judges ORDER BY judge_name DESC
SELECT judge_name, expertise FROM Judges
SELECT * FROM Singers ORDER BY singer_name DESC, age
SELECT singer_name, nationality FROM Singers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 25
SELECT song_title, performance_date, singer_name FROM Performances INNER JOIN Singers ON Performances.singer_id = Singers.singer_id WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT judge_name, expertise FROM Judges WHERE expertise LIKE '%singing%' ORDER BY judge_id
SELECT * FROM Scores INNER JOIN Judges ON Scores.judge_id = Judges.judge_id WHERE Scores.score >= 8
